sources.name: corona_csv_file
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  corona_csv_file

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared corona_csv_file = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://datalake20210531.dfs.core.windows.net/coronadata/onsdag/covid19/overvagning/data/overvaagningsdata-covid19-01062021-fg22/Test_pos_over_time.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = corona_csv_file
in
  Source;
